pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of the Multivariate Marine Recovery Index // Computation of the multivariate marine recovery index, including functions for data visualization and ecological diagnostics of marine ecosystems. The computational details are described in the original publication. Reference: Chauvel, N., Grall, J., Thibaut, E., Houbin, C., Pezy, J.P. (in press). "A general-purpose Multivariate Marine Recovery Index for quantifying the influence of human activities on benthic habitat ecological status". Ecological Indicators.
